attributes.action: Stop the council proposal of closing our schools
attributes.additional_details: We, as concerned parents, carers, and community members, strongly oppose the council’s proposal to close schools. This decision would have a deeply damaging impact on our children’s education, wellbeing, and sense of security, while also placing our dedicated teachers’ jobs and livelihoods at risk. Schools are at the heart of our community, providing not only learning but also stability, support, and opportunity. We urge the council to reconsider this proposal.
attributes.background: Consider as parents our thoughts about this decision and how this is going to affect our children.

rejection.details:
We can’t accept petitions that call for action at a local level.

You could ask your MP to take action on your concerns about this issue. You can find contact details for your local MP here: https://members.parliament.uk/FindYourMP

You could also raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
